item.title: Stock Algorithmic Trading (Work in Progress)
item.description: Algorithmic Trading (Work in progress) This project is about trying to develop an intelligent way of following stock market trends to improve returns compared to buying and holding onto stock. I will specifically try to maximize returns from the S&P 500. Data I will use the performance of large market cap companies contained in the S&P 500 order to assist in trend prediction. To gather data for all of the stock I need, I used a web scraper to scrape the wikipedia page of the S&P 500 and the python package yfinance to collect financial data and recover the adjusted closing price for a user defined range of dates that can be defined in config.
